value:
$WmMPID_ニイメ,ch02_36_Nimue_F_Normal,Face|Well. It seems we took care of that!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Is everyone all right?$k$p$WmMPID_開花イドゥン,ch02_14_Idenn_F_Bloom01,Face|Yes... I am all right.$k$p$WmMPID_ヒュウ,ch02_35_Hugh_M_Normal,Face|Phew. It's been a while since I've
seen Nana work her elder magic, but
it sure is incredible.$k$pSeriously Nana, couldn't you have
just saved the Kingdom of Askr from
danger on your own?$k$p$WmMPID_ニイメ,ch02_36_Nimue_F_Normal,Face|What foolish nonsense are you on
about? Trying to cut corners... It's
time you start taking things seriously.$k$p$WmMPID_ヒュウ,ch02_35_Hugh_M_Normal,Face|Nana, come on! I'm your grandson.
Don't be so mean to me in front of all
these people from other worlds!$k$p$WmMPID_キャス,ch02_37_Cath_F_Normal,Face|Hmm...$k$p$WmMPID_ヒュウ,ch02_35_Hugh_M_Normal,Face|Huh? What's the matter, Cath?
You've got a major wrinkle going on
between your eyes.$k$p$WmMPID_キャス,ch02_37_Cath_F_Normal,Face|Oh... Um, can I talk to you for a
minute? It's about Idunn. Don't you
think she's kind of...strange?$k$p$WmMPID_ヒュウ,ch02_35_Hugh_M_Normal,Face|Strange? Well, I was just thinking
about how her eyes are different
colors, and they're real pretty...$k$p$WmMPID_キャス,ch02_37_Cath_F_Normal,Face|That's not what I meant! I...I've heard
rumors about her. They say she's,
like, the incarnation of dread...$k$pI've heard she has the power to
destroy all of Elibe, all by herself.$k$pSome people even say that she can
create a bunch of terrifying dragons
to serve at her command...$k$pIt doesn't make a lot of sense, but
there has to be some truth to the
rumors, right?$k$p$WmMPID_ヒュウ,ch02_35_Hugh_M_Normal,Face|Yeah, I've heard stories. Apparently
she was called the Dark Priestess
when she followed the king of Bern.$k$pBut if you ask me, the Idunn over
there is a lot different from the
rumors. She doesn't seem too scary...$k$p$WmMPID_キャス,ch02_37_Cath_F_Normal,Face|I wonder... Could it be that she just
isn't fighting with her full strength?$k$pIf she's supposed to have all of this
incredible power, why wouldn't she
use it to help us?$k$p$WmMPID_ヒュウ,ch02_35_Hugh_M_Normal,Face|That's a good question. If even half
the rumors are true, she could end
this war in no time.$k$p$WmMPID_キャス,ch02_37_Cath_F_Normal,Face|I know! I'll just go ask her!$k$p$WmMPID_ヒュウ,ch02_35_Hugh_M_Normal,Face|H-hey, Cath—wait!$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_キャス,ch02_37_Cath_F_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|Hey, Idunn. I was just thinking, well,
wondering really, if maybe you
weren't using your full strength?$k$p$WmMPID_開花イドゥン,ch02_14_Idenn_F_Bloom01,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_キャス,ch02_37_Cath_F_Normal,Face|Oh, and I also heard rumors that you
can create lots of scary dragons, and
that you can control them.$k$p$WmMPID_開花イドゥン,ch02_14_Idenn_F_Bloom01,Face|No. No...I'm sorry. I can't...I can't use
those powers anymore...$k$pNo... I won't use them.$k$p$WmMPID_キャス,ch02_37_Cath_F_Normal,Face|Idunn, wait...!$k$p$WmMPID_ヒュウ,ch02_35_Hugh_M_Normal,Face|There she goes...$k$p$WmMPID_キャス,ch02_37_Cath_F_Normal,Face|Huh. What was all that about? I was
just asking an innocent question. Why
did she look so sad about it?$k$p$WmMPID_ニイメ,ch02_36_Nimue_F_Normal,Face|Hmm...$k$p
